title: The difference is that it’s true
author: VD
content_html:
Insty doesn’t quite grok:

MICHELLE MALKIN GETS CALLED A “PROSTITUTE” ON THE AIR: No doubt there will be an Imus-like groundswell of outrage.

Because Me So Ho is the penultimate media whore, no one is going to get any more upset about her being called a prostitute than they were about the late Anna Nicole Smith or Paris Hilton being similarly identified. Malkin has it coming to her, the Rutgers’ team, as far as we know, didn’t.

Furthermore, as I already pointed out, Imus was targeted for the “nappy-haired” bit, not the “hos”.
content_text:
Insty
doesn’t quite grok
:
MICHELLE MALKIN GETS CALLED A “PROSTITUTE” ON THE AIR: No doubt there will be an Imus-like groundswell of outrage.
Because Me So Ho is the penultimate media whore, no one is going to get any more upset about her being called a prostitute than they were about the late Anna Nicole Smith or Paris Hilton being similarly identified.  Malkin has it coming to her, the Rutgers’ team, as far as we know, didn’t.
Furthermore, as I already pointed out, Imus was targeted for the “nappy-haired” bit, not the “hos”.
